bug.author: kazunarikudo
bug.summary: The firstly applied aspect ratio is always used.
bug.description:
Describe the bug The firstly applied aspect ratio is always used. If you firstly applied 400 x 300 canvas, then it'll be used again even if you changed the ROI. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Start image acquisition. Stop image acquisition. Change ROI. Start image acquisition. You'll see the 1st ROI setting is still applied to the canvas.
Expected behavior Aspect ratio must be updated every time when ROI is changed.
